name: Dolly Evelyn Smith
bio: When Dollie Evelyn Smith was born on 27 September 1894, in Alabama, United States, her father, Seburn Lumpkin Smith, was 32 and her mother, Pruanne Minerva Burkett, was 35. She married Joel Develle Stinson on 26 November 1911, in Butler, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 2 sons and 7 daughters. She lived in Butler, Fresno, California, United States in 1935 and Election Precinct 1 Starlington, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1940. She died on 22 May 1985, in Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 90, and was buried in Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States.
